column1: # This file contains sample CSV rows for testing the bulk upload feature
# 1. Copy the CSV rows below (without the # comments) into a new file
# NOTE: These are example events with fictional data for testing purposes

column9: Large-scale HTTP flood targeting e-commerce platform during peak hours. Approx 100Gbps traffic sustained for 2 hours.
DNS amplification attack using misconfigured open resolvers. Amplification factor estimated at 50x.
Coordinated attack combining volumetric floods and application-layer attacks. Investigation ongoing.
NTP amplification attack exploiting monlist command. Attack mitigated by upstream provider.
Classic SYN flood targeting HTTPS service. Mitigated with SYN cookies. Case closed.
Memcached amplification with extremely high amplification factor (50000x). Limited sharing due to ongoing investigation.
SSDP reflection attack using vulnerable IoT devices. Botnet of approximately 10000 devices.
UDP flood targeting Minecraft server. Attack lasted 30 minutes. Service restored.
